cons: Patients were hit or miss but usually miss

review_title: It’s not the best, not the worst
pros: Room for growth, bonuses, patients are kinder than most hospitals

job_title: Certified Occupational Therapy Assistant in Oakmont, PA
pros: Good position to learn about a vast number of diagnosis’s. Job security. Good benefits.
cons: Lack of effective communication among different departments. Job expectations can be unclear. Unprofessional behavior is seldom addressed and/or corrected.

job_title: Medical Laboratory Technician in Pittsburgh, PA
pros: Parking is cheap and easy.  Benefits are good.  Jefferson is easily accessible and traffic is not bad.  It is an enjoyable place to be most of the time.  Most things are easy to figure out and understand.
cons: Mediocre place to work.  Too many employees have been there for too long and they are not innovative in their care.  Supervisors are out of touch and do not treat professionals as professionals.  Computer system is outdated and difficult to use at times.  Changes are not made in a timely manner to help employees do their job better.

review_title: Would stay indefinitely if they weren't too cheap to give me full-time!
pros: Co-workers are awesome to work with, very nice hospital and environment.
cons: I work part-time and wanted to go full-time, however, they wouldn't let any part-timers go full-time, yet hired two additional part-timers...  sounds like a cheap way to get out of paying for benefits to me.... I will be leaving for this reason.

review_title: they do not appreciate what we do

pros: The people are friendly and they help you with a lot of things, you are put right to work after they explain all the work that you have to do
cons: Little pay for all of that tedious cleaning, you really have to clean. And the sometimes you are followed around

cons: bullying seems contagious in some departments from management to non management and peers to other peers.

cons: Cafeteria is a little expensive, very busy community hospital in need of staffing in all areas,   PTO is shared with sick days.
